alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:35AM EST until December 25 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Piscataquog River near Goffstown affecting Hillsborough County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. For the PISCATAQUOG RIVER...including Goffstown...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Warner River...including Davisville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at about 20 camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. Flooding also begins at the Epsom Valley Campground. At 10.0 feet, The lower section of the Lazy River Campground floods. Two campsites at the Epsom Valley Campground flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
